vernac_cmds: Fixpoint sum_nm (n : nat) : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> nat := fun (m : nat) (f : nat -> nat) => match n with | O => f m | S n' => f m + sum_nm n' (S m) f end.
Lemma sum_nm_i : forall (m n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), sum_nm (S n) m f = f m + sum_nm n (S m) f.
Lemma sum_nm_f : forall (m n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), sum_nm (S n) m f = sum_nm n m f + f (m + S n).
intros m n f; generalize m; clear m; elim n; simpl in |- *; intros.
rewrite H; repeat (rewrite (plus_comm m); simpl in |- *); auto with arith.
Lemma sum_nm_ext : forall (m n : nat) (f g : nat -> nat), (forall x : nat, x <= n -> f (m + x) = g (m + x)) -> sum_nm n m f = sum_nm n m g.
intros m n f g; generalize m; clear m; elim n; simpl in |- *; intros.
intros x H'; simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_n_Sm; auto with arith.
Lemma sum_nm_add : forall (m n : nat) (f g : nat -> nat), sum_nm n m f + sum_nm n m g = sum_nm n m (fun i : nat => f i + g i).
intros m n f g; generalize m; elim n; auto; intros; simpl in |- *.
Lemma sum_nm_times : forall (m n x : nat) (f : nat -> nat), x * sum_nm n m f = sum_nm n m (fun i : nat => x * f i).
intros m n x f; generalize m; elim n; auto; intros; simpl in |- *.
Lemma inv_sum_nm : forall (P : nat -> Prop) (i n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), (forall a b : nat, P a -> P b -> P (a + b)) -> (forall x : nat, x <= n -> P (f (i + x))) -> P (sum_nm n i f).
intros P i n f; generalize i; clear i; elim n; clear n; intros; simpl in |- *.
intros x H'; simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_n_Sm; auto with arith.
Lemma t_sum_Svars : forall (n k : nat) (f : nat -> nat), sum_nm k n f = sum_nm k (S n) (fun i : nat => f (pred i)).
intros n k f; generalize n; elim k; auto; intros; simpl in |- *.
Fixpoint binomial (a : nat) : nat -> nat := fun b : nat => match a, b with | _, O => 1 | O, S b' => 0 | S a', S b' => binomial a' (S b') + binomial a' b' end.
Lemma binomial_def1 : forall n : nat, binomial n 0 = 1.
Lemma binomial_def2 : forall n m : nat, n < m -> binomial n m = 0.
simple induction n; simpl in |- *; auto.
intros m; case m; simpl in |- *; auto.
intros n0 H' m; case m; simpl in |- *; auto.
Lemma binomial_def3 : forall n : nat, binomial n n = 1.
simple induction n; intros; simpl in |- *; auto.
Lemma binomial_def4 : forall n k : nat, k < n -> binomial (S n) (S k) = binomial n (S k) + binomial n k.
Lemma binomial_fact : forall m n : nat, binomial (n + m) n * (factorial n * factorial m) = factorial (n + m).
intros m; elim m; clear m.
intros n; rewrite plus_comm; simpl in |- *; rewrite binomial_def3; simpl in |- *; rewrite mult_comm; simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_comm; simpl in |- *; auto.
intros m H' n; elim n; clear n.
simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_comm; simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_comm; simpl in |- *; auto.
replace (S n + S m) with (S (S n + m)); [ idtac | simpl in |- * ]; auto.
rewrite binomial_def4; [ idtac | rewrite plus_comm; simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_comm ]; auto with arith.
apply (trans_equal (A:=nat)) with (y := factorial (S n + m) * S m + factorial (n + S m) * S n).
apply f_equal2 with (A1 := nat) (A2 := nat); auto.
repeat rewrite mult_assoc_reverse; rewrite (mult_comm (factorial m)); simpl in |- *; auto.
rewrite mult_assoc_reverse; rewrite mult_comm with (m := S n); rewrite (mult_assoc (S n)); simpl in |- *; auto.
apply (trans_equal (A:=nat)) with (y := (S m + S n) * factorial (S n + m)).
rewrite mult_plus_distr_r; apply f_equal2 with (A1 := nat) (A2 := nat).
Theorem exp_Pascal : forall a b n : nat, power (a + b) n = sum_nm n 0 (fun k : nat => binomial n k * (power a (n - k) * power b k)).
simpl in |- *; repeat rewrite mult_comm with (m := 1); simpl in |- *; repeat rewrite <- plus_n_O; auto.
apply trans_equal with (y := (a + b) * power (a + b) (S n1)).
rewrite H'; rewrite mult_plus_distr_r; repeat rewrite sum_nm_times.
replace (1 * (power a (S n1 - 0) * power b 0)) with (power a (S n1)); [ idtac | rewrite mult_comm with (m := 1); simpl in |- *; repeat rewrite plus_comm with (m := 0) ]; auto.
replace (S n1 - (0 + S n1)) with 0; [ idtac | simpl in |- *; apply minus_n_n ]; auto.
replace (b * (1 * (1 * power b (0 + S n1)))) with (b * power b (S n1)); [ idtac | simpl in |- *; repeat rewrite <- plus_n_O ]; auto.

replace (a * power a (S n1) + sum_nm n1 1 (fun z : nat => a * (binomial (S n1) z * (power a (S n1 - z) * power b z))) + (sum_nm n1 1 (fun x : nat => b * (binomial (S n1) (pred x) * (power a (S n1 - pred x) * power b (pred x)))) + b * power b (S n1))) with (power a (S (S n1)) + (sum_nm n1 1 (fun x : nat => binomial (S (S n1)) x * (power a (S (S n1) - x) * power b x)) + power b (S (S n1)))).
replace (S (S n1) - (1 + S n1)) with 0; auto with arith.
replace (1 * (power a (S (S n1)) * 1)) with (power a (S (S n1))); [ idtac | repeat rewrite mult_comm with (m := 1); simpl in |- *; repeat rewrite plus_comm with (m := 0); simpl in |- * ]; auto.
replace (1 + S n1) with (S (S n1)); auto.
replace (1 * (1 * power b (S (S n1)))) with (power b (S (S n1))); [ idtac | repeat rewrite mult_comm with (m := 1); simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_comm with (m := 0); simpl in |- * ]; auto.
repeat rewrite plus_assoc_reverse; apply plus_eq; auto.
repeat rewrite plus_assoc; apply plus_eq; auto.
replace (pred (1 + x)) with x; [ idtac | auto ].
replace (S (S n1) - (1 + x)) with (S n1 - x); [ idtac | auto ].
replace (S n1 - (1 + x)) with (n1 - x); [ idtac | auto ].
replace (1 + x) with (S x); [ idtac | auto ].
repeat rewrite mult_assoc; apply mult_eq; auto.
rewrite (mult_comm a); repeat rewrite mult_assoc_reverse; apply mult_eq; auto.
rewrite (mult_comm b); repeat rewrite mult_assoc_reverse; apply mult_eq; auto.

command: intros m n f; generalize m; clear m; elim n; simpl in |- *; intros.
rewrite H; repeat (rewrite (plus_comm m); simpl in |- *); auto with arith.
intros m n f g; generalize m; clear m; elim n; simpl in |- *; intros.
intros x H'; simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_n_Sm; auto with arith.
intros m n f g; generalize m; elim n; auto; intros; simpl in |- *.
intros m n x f; generalize m; elim n; auto; intros; simpl in |- *.
intros P i n f; generalize i; clear i; elim n; clear n; intros; simpl in |- *.
intros x H'; simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_n_Sm; auto with arith.
intros n k f; generalize n; elim k; auto; intros; simpl in |- *.
simple induction n; simpl in |- *; auto.
intros m; case m; simpl in |- *; auto.
intros n0 H' m; case m; simpl in |- *; auto.
simple induction n; intros; simpl in |- *; auto.
intros m; elim m; clear m.
intros n; rewrite plus_comm; simpl in |- *; rewrite binomial_def3; simpl in |- *; rewrite mult_comm; simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_comm; simpl in |- *; auto.
intros m H' n; elim n; clear n.
simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_comm; simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_comm; simpl in |- *; auto.
replace (S n + S m) with (S (S n + m)); [ idtac | simpl in |- * ]; auto.
rewrite binomial_def4; [ idtac | rewrite plus_comm; simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_comm ]; auto with arith.
apply (trans_equal (A:=nat)) with (y := factorial (S n + m) * S m + factorial (n + S m) * S n).
apply f_equal2 with (A1 := nat) (A2 := nat); auto.
repeat rewrite mult_assoc_reverse; rewrite (mult_comm (factorial m)); simpl in |- *; auto.
rewrite mult_assoc_reverse; rewrite mult_comm with (m := S n); rewrite (mult_assoc (S n)); simpl in |- *; auto.
apply (trans_equal (A:=nat)) with (y := (S m + S n) * factorial (S n + m)).
rewrite mult_plus_distr_r; apply f_equal2 with (A1 := nat) (A2 := nat).
simpl in |- *; repeat rewrite mult_comm with (m := 1); simpl in |- *; repeat rewrite <- plus_n_O; auto.
apply trans_equal with (y := (a + b) * power (a + b) (S n1)).
rewrite H'; rewrite mult_plus_distr_r; repeat rewrite sum_nm_times.
replace (1 * (power a (S n1 - 0) * power b 0)) with (power a (S n1)); [ idtac | rewrite mult_comm with (m := 1); simpl in |- *; repeat rewrite plus_comm with (m := 0) ]; auto.
replace (S n1 - (0 + S n1)) with 0; [ idtac | simpl in |- *; apply minus_n_n ]; auto.
replace (b * (1 * (1 * power b (0 + S n1)))) with (b * power b (S n1)); [ idtac | simpl in |- *; repeat rewrite <- plus_n_O ]; auto.

replace (a * power a (S n1) + sum_nm n1 1 (fun z : nat => a * (binomial (S n1) z * (power a (S n1 - z) * power b z))) + (sum_nm n1 1 (fun x : nat => b * (binomial (S n1) (pred x) * (power a (S n1 - pred x) * power b (pred x)))) + b * power b (S n1))) with (power a (S (S n1)) + (sum_nm n1 1 (fun x : nat => binomial (S (S n1)) x * (power a (S (S n1) - x) * power b x)) + power b (S (S n1)))).
replace (S (S n1) - (1 + S n1)) with 0; auto with arith.
replace (1 * (power a (S (S n1)) * 1)) with (power a (S (S n1))); [ idtac | repeat rewrite mult_comm with (m := 1); simpl in |- *; repeat rewrite plus_comm with (m := 0); simpl in |- * ]; auto.
replace (1 + S n1) with (S (S n1)); auto.
replace (1 * (1 * power b (S (S n1)))) with (power b (S (S n1))); [ idtac | repeat rewrite mult_comm with (m := 1); simpl in |- *; rewrite plus_comm with (m := 0); simpl in |- * ]; auto.
repeat rewrite plus_assoc_reverse; apply plus_eq; auto.
repeat rewrite plus_assoc; apply plus_eq; auto.
replace (pred (1 + x)) with x; [ idtac | auto ].
replace (S (S n1) - (1 + x)) with (S n1 - x); [ idtac | auto ].
replace (S n1 - (1 + x)) with (n1 - x); [ idtac | auto ].
replace (1 + x) with (S x); [ idtac | auto ].
repeat rewrite mult_assoc; apply mult_eq; auto.
rewrite (mult_comm a); repeat rewrite mult_assoc_reverse; apply mult_eq; auto.
rewrite (mult_comm b); repeat rewrite mult_assoc_reverse; apply mult_eq; auto.
